General.Name: Solusi Tunas Pratama Tbk
General.Description: PT Solusi Tunas Pratama Tbk operates as an independent tower company in Indonesia. It operates through two segments, Tower Rental and Other Services. The company manages and leases base transceiver station (BTS) towers. It operates greenfield and rooftop towers, including four-legged supporting towers, three-legged self-supporting towers, camouflage towers, monopoles, and roof top towers, as well as mobile BTS. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Solusi Tunas Pratama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Profesional Telekomunikasi Indonesia.
General.Address: Perkantoran Permata Senayan Blok C1, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12210
